user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfort and support in a wireless bra that would be suitable for everyday wear.
purchase_reason: I was drawn to this product because of its promise of softness and lightweight comfort, which I found appealing for everyday wear. The idea of a wireless bra that provides flexible support without the discomfort of traditional bras was a significant factor in my decision. However, the fit was not ideal for me, leading to my decision to pass it on to a friend.

I purchased this item based on my previous positive experience with a similar product. I expected the same level of comfort and support, but I was disappointed with the fit of this particular color. The inconsistency in sizing led me to feel unimpressed, and I ultimately decided to donate it.

I was looking for a comfortable wirefree option and was attracted to the cotton material and design. However, I found it uncomfortable, likely due to my size change. I recognized that my discomfort might be due to my own sizing error rather than the product itself.

I was seeking a wireless bra that offered both support and comfort, and the detailed description of its features, such as the TruSupport system and moisture-wicking fabric, appealed to me. Unfortunately, the fit was not satisfactory, which I attributed to possibly ordering the wrong size.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort and quality, especially in clothing and footwear. I value items that provide a good fit and are versatile enough for various occasions, whether for work or casual wear. I appreciate features like soft materials, supportive designs, and thoughtful construction that enhance comfort, such as cushioned footbeds in shoes or breathable fabrics in clothing. Additionally, I tend to favor products that maintain their comfort over time, as I have experienced discomfort with items that start off well but do not last. On the other hand, I dislike products that are poorly made or do not provide good value for money, as well as items that do not fit well or are uncomfortable, regardless of their initial appeal. Overall, I seek a balance of style, comfort, and durability in my purchases.

I usually look for wireless bras in the size range that fits me comfortably, typically ranging from (size range). Can you recommend any wireless bras that offer both comfort and support within my expected price range?

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Wireless Bra, Full-Coverage Wirefree Bra (Retired Colors)> / Item ID: B0C1T5BQYX / Price: $33.14 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Fall in love with the comfort of Bali's Comfort Revolution® full-coverage wireless bra. Destined to become your go-to, everyday favorite for working out or just hanging out, its four-way stretch fabric flexes and moves with you. At the same time, strategically placed reinforced zones provide the support and shaping you need, including at the under band and around the cups. Its seamless design delivers a sleek, smooth look under even the clingiest clothes. And here's a bonus: Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking fabric that helps keep you cool, calm, and collected. This is a seamless, wireless, matchless bra to put on and forget. Available in so many size options, so you're sure to find your perfect fit."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Wireless Bra, ComfortFlex Fit Full-Coverage Bra, DF3488> / Item ID: B08YXLHV18 / Price: $28.14 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Fall in love with the comfort of Bali's Comfort Revolution® full-coverage wireless bra. Destined to become your go-to, everday favorite for working out or just hanging out, its four-way stretch fabric flexes and moves with you. At the same time, strategically placed reinforced zones provide the support and shaping you need, including at the underband and around the cups. Its seamless design delivers a sleek, smooth look under even the clingiest clothes. And here's a bonus: Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking fabric that helps keep you cool, calm, and collected. This is a seamless, wireless, matchless bra to put on and forget. Available in so many size options, so you're sure to find your perfect fit."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <JUST MY SIZE Womens Wireless Bra, Comfort Shaping Full Figure Wire-Free Bra> / Item ID: B0BLN29R4S / Price: $14.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['This Just My Size Comfort Shaping Wirefree Bra is so pretty with its faux "diamond" metallic embellishment and sheer mesh trim you might buy it just for its looks. But it’s the comfy fabric rings that shape and lift your bust – without any wire - that you will learn to love in this wireless bra. Supportive patterned cups, fully adjustable straps, and a plush comfort wirefree band comfortably contour your curves. A stretch mesh neckline provides breathability and a feminine touch in what just may become your go-to wireless bra. Make this a bra that fits you perfectly with the help of three to four rows - depending on the size of the bra - of adjustable hooks and eyes at the back.']
